verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, You and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> with you shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: and you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your priesthood <S%H3550><s%>.

And your brothers <S%H251><s%> also of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>, bring <S%H7126><s%> you with you <S%H3867><s%>, that they may be joined unto you <S%H8334><s%>, and minister unto you <S%H1121><s%>: but you and your sons with you shall minister before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness <S%H5715><s%>.

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your charge <S%H4931><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of all the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>: only they shall not come near <S%H7126><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, that neither they <S%H4191><s%>, nor you also, die.

And they shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto you <S%H8104><s%>, and keep the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, for all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>: and a stranger <S%H2114><s%> shall not come near unto you <S%H7126><s%>.

And you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: that there be no wrath <S%H7110><s%> any more upon the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And I <S%H3947><s%>, behold, I have taken your brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: to you they are given <S%H5414><s%> as a gift <S%H4979><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

Therefore you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> with you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your priest <S%H3550><s%>'s office for every thing <S%H1697><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and inside <S%H1004><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>; and you shall serve <S%H5647><s%>: I have given <S%H5414><s%> your priest <S%H3550><s%>'s office unto you as a service <S%H5656><s%> of gift <S%H4979><s%>: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I also have given you the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of all the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; unto you have I given <S%H5414><s%> them by reason of the anointing <S%H4888><s%>, and to your sons <S%H1121><s%>, by an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

This shall be your of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, reserved from the fire <S%H784><s%>: every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of theirs <S%H4503><s%>, every food offering of theirs <S%H2403><s%>, and every sin offering of theirs <S%H817><s%>, and every trespass offering of theirs <S%H7725><s%>, which they shall render unto me <S%H6944><s%>, shall be most holy <S%H6944><s%> for you and for your sons <S%H1121><s%>.
In the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place shall you eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H2145><s%>; every male shall eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H6944><s%>: it shall be holy unto you.

And this is your <S%H8641><s%>; the heave offering of their gift <S%H4976><s%>, with all the wave offerings <S%H8573><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: I have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto you <S%H1121><s%>, and to your sons and to your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you <S%H2706><s%>, by a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%>: every one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat of it <S%H398><s%>.

All the best <S%H2459><s%> of the oil <S%H3323><s%>, and all the best <S%H2459><s%> of the wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of the wheat <S%H1715><s%>, the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of them which they shall offer <S%H5414><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, them have I given you <S%H5414><s%>.

And whatever is first ripe <S%H1061><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, which they shall bring <S%H935><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, shall be your <S%H2889><s%>; every one that is clean in your house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat of it <S%H398><s%>.
Every thing devoted <S%H2764><s%> in Israel shall be your <S%H3478><s%>.

Every thing that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> in all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, which they bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, whether it be of men <S%H120><s%> or animals <S%H929><s%>, shall be your <S%H1060><s%>: nevertheless the firstborn of man <S%H120><s%> shall you surely <S%H6299><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%>, and the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> animals <S%H929><s%> shall you redeem <S%H6299><s%>.

And those that are to be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall you redeem <S%H6299><s%>, according to your estimation <S%H6187><s%>, for the money <S%H3701><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, which is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>.

But the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of a cow <S%H7794><s%>, or the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of a sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of a goat <S%H5795><s%>, you shall not redeem <S%H6299><s%>; they are holy <S%H6944><s%>: you shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> their fat <S%H2459><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of them shall be your <S%H8573><s%>, as the wave breast <S%H2373><s%> and as the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder are your <S%H7785><s%>.

All the heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, have I given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, and your sons and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> with you <S%H2706><s%>, by a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%>: it is a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto you and to your seed with you <S%H2233><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, You shall have no inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, neither shall you have any part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H2506><s%>: I am your part and your inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I have given the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> all the tenth <S%H4643><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, for <S%H2500><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> which they serve <S%H5647><s%>, even the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

Neither must the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> henceforth <S%H5750><s%> come near <S%H7126><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, lest they carry <S%H5375><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%>, and die <S%H4191><s%>.

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and they shall carry <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>, that among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they have <S%H5157><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

But the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they offer <S%H7311><s%> as an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to inherit <S%H5159><s%>: therefore I have said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8432><s%>, Among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5157><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3947><s%>, When you take of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the tithes <S%H4643><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you from them for your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, then you shall offer <S%H7311><s%> up an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of it for the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, even a tenth <S%H4643><s%> part of the tithe <S%H4643><s%>.

And this your heave offering <S%H8641><s%> shall be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> unto you <S%H1715><s%>, as though it were the corn of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the fullness <S%H4395><s%> of the winepress <S%H3342><s%>.

Thus you also shall offer <S%H7311><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of all your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, which you receive <S%H3947><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> there the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s heave offering <S%H8641><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

Out of all your gifts <S%H4979><s%> you shall offer <S%H7311><s%> every heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, of all the best <S%H2459><s%> there <S%H4720><s%>, even the hallowed part there out of it.

Therefore you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7311><s%>, When you have heaved the best <S%H2459><s%> there from it <S%H2803><s%>, then it shall be counted unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the winepress <S%H3342><s%>.

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in every place <S%H4725><s%>, you and your households <S%H1004><s%>: for it is your reward <S%H7939><s%> for <S%H2500><s%> your service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And you shall carry <S%H5375><s%> no sin <S%H2399><s%> by reason of it <S%H7311><s%>, when you have heaved from it the best <S%H2459><s%> of it <S%H2490><s%>: neither shall you pollute the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, lest you die <S%H4191><s%>.
